19. Semantic Changes and Warnings


Up: Contents Next: Semantic Changes Previous: C++ Bindings

This chapter lists semantic changes that have been introduced into the MPI standard as well as warnings that could potentially impact program behavior. In addition to those listed here, Chapter Removed Interfaces also lists changes and backward incompatibilities caused by removing interfaces. Unlike Chapter Removed Interfaces, the changes in this chapter did not go through a deprecation process.
